oops,nevermind.found it=]

just in case if anyone is looking or will look into this.
Navigate to the folder  C:\Users\USERNAME\Saved Games\Assassin's Creed

Locate the file ACBrotherhood.ini and open it with a text editor such as notepad.

and voila!
